data

Interface ITaskData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskData

    public interface ITaskData
    Facade for TaskData - used by the managers for read/write operations to TaskData. (e.g. SearchManager)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NO_TASK

      • add

        TaskId add(TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - information about a task.
        Returns:
        the generated taskId of the task. Returns null if unable to add new task.

      • remove

        boolean remove(TaskId taskId)
        Parameters:
        taskId - id of the task you wish to remove.
        Returns:
        true iff the deletion is successful. Deletion can be unsuccessful if task does not exist.

      • reverseLastChange

        void reverseLastChange()
        Use to reverse all the changes in the last undo snapshot.
